content: You had some pretty good points in this. Especially the bit about “if you aren’t designing with the user's needs involved, who knows what you're doing?” A lot of “designers” are just taking examples and combining them instead of using inspiration to create something better. Realistically, you should be able to provide a new experience that people can understand and be comfortable using. The problem is lack of trying and creating and that is why websites are all starting to look the same. “This looks good and it’s working so let’s create something like it.” Build on it and make it better!
